content.title: Publish an App to Enterprise Store
content.body:
Let’s get started!


In this hike, you will learn how to publish an app to the Enterprise App Store for Android.


Before you get started, complete the hike:

  1. Import & Launch a Native App

Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hike.

To open a closed project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > RecipientsMobile.


When you are ready, click Start!
